name: lambda-building-blocks
description: Reusable AWS Lambda functions for i2speedex migration

scripts.build: npm run build:cdk && npm run build:functions
scripts.build:cdk: cd cdk && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:functions: npm run build:html-to-pdf && npm run build:email-reconciler
scripts.build:html-to-pdf: cd functions/html-to-pdf && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:email-reconciler: cd functions/email-reconciler && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:functions: npm run test:html-to-pdf && npm run test:email-reconciler
scripts.clean: rm -rf cdk/dist cdk/node_modules functions/html-to-pdf/dist functions/html-to-pdf/node_modules functions/email-reconciler/dist functions/email-reconciler/node_modules
